issues.title: Fallback conversations not grouped by signature before orphan routing
issues.why: Each fallback conversation routed individually to OrphanService instead of grouped by issue_signature. Creates unnecessary DB calls and orphan churn. OrphanService handles duplicates but inefficient.
issues.fix: Group fallback conversations by issue_signature (using defaultdict) before calling _route_to_orphan_integration(). Reduces DB calls and aligns with signature-based fallback behavior.
